title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost when the default value is modified.
OB: After modifying the default value of a list box in the report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.
EB: The default value for the list box in the report parameter should be retained even after modifying the default value.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Enter three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Open the Edit Parameter dialog again, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
